matchDesiredStats: Synchronization: the desired stats are displayed in the found builds
unmatchDesiredStats: Dissociation: the stats displayed in the builds are independent
updateAvailableText: Do you want to update the app?
resetSettingsText: Do you really want to reset settings?
deleteAllBuildsInMemoryText: Do you really want to delete all saved builds?
appliedForBuildFinderAndComparator: Applied when the app starts for the Finder and the Comparator
doYouWantToOpenTheBrowser: Do you want to open the browser?
welcomeText: This tool helps you find the best build based on your playstyle. If you need help, long-press an element (button, picture, abbreviation) to view its description, or use the help button at the top of the screen.
tutoImportation: Copy the text, go to 'Collection', and click the 'Import' (clipboard) button.
